skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: A dedicated career shifter aiming to excel in front-end development. Leveraging my prior skills, I'm committed to learning the latest technologies and design principles to create impactful digital interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Motivated career shifter. Eager to leverage my past experience while acquiring new technical skills to build efficient and scalable server-side solutions, contributing effectively to the development of robust web applications.

skills.title: Full-Stack
skills.description: Passionate career shifter venturing into React.js development, fueled by a desire to merge creativity with coding. Eager to harness my adaptable skills in a new direction.

portfolio.title: Static Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I develop visually engaging and responsive web pages that deliver information effectively and provide an excellent user experience.

portfolio.title: Simple E-commerce website
portfolio.description: I am commitment in learning, I'm excited to apply my evolving skills in web development to craft intuitive interfaces and functional e-commerce solutions that captivate customers and drive business growth.

portfolio.title: Simple E-commerce website with auth
portfolio.description: A straightforward e-commerce website with authentication functionality and a server.
